oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis of Withasomnines and Their Non-natural Analogues from Aldehydes and 4-Nitro-1-butanol in Three Steps
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: VERMA, D
KUMAR, R
NAMBOOTHIRI, INN
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: BESTMANN-OHIRA REAGENT
BASE-MEDIATED REACTION
PYRAZOLE ALKALOIDS
NEWBOULDIA-LAEVIS
REGIOSELECTIVE SYNTHESIS
RADICAL CYCLIZATION
SULFONYLPYRAZOLES
NITROALKENES
BARK
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Total synthesis of all three pyrazole-based withasomnine alkaloids and selected examples of their non-natural analogs has been achieved from readily available aldehydes and 4-nitro-1-butanol in three steps. Since 4-nitro-1-butanol in turn is prepared in two steps via Michael addition of nitromethane to acrylate followed by borane reduction of the ester group and the key 1,3-dipolar cycloaddition step is carried out with commercially available TMSCHN2, this approach is a very convenient and economical one.
